title: Abusement
body: im sick and tired of being abused i get abused every game for nothing, riot please do something about, i cant report them because it does nothing i am only new and it sickens me that there are people out there that say these things, i dont see how they get enjoyment out of telling someone to kill themselves, there are 2 players that just target me. I dont feel like im having fun playing this game cos of the toxic community. This game i disgraceful and i dont want to play it anymore just saying to riot that you are going to lose a lot of players because of your toxic community and nothing happens when you report them

replies.body:
> i cant report them because **it does nothing**

Of course it does nothing if they're not getting reported. It's not like Riot employees sit there all day running through a database of summoner names and picking people out at random to get punished.

Soft approach from Riot promoted toxic behaviour lol

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/JY1HjUbU-okay

Seems like it is changing for the better, lets hope it stays that way

> It won't stop ever

There's a reason for that, it's called "human nature".
um he believes that reporting them doesn't result in any kind of punishment
Which it does as shown by a post by a regular board member that's a toxic cunt, he clearly got banned.

That's a rarity, I get chat restricted all the time and I know for a fact I'm in the top 20 most toxic players in OCE. Reporting does nothing. You have to get reported so many times for it to take any significant effect
I know what OP meant, I was paying out destined for their statements.
I kinda agree that it is a bit excessive. Both ranked games I played today I was heavily abused. A vayne called me a inbred c***. Not the greatest game

I'll invite you guys, if you don't like the way things are, be the change you want to see in the world.

I've been an overly positive summoner ( to the best of my knowledge ) and it's helped immensely. If you try and lead by a good example, you might end up changing someone. 

I made a thread on the old forums about it, and it got turned into an article, which I invite you to check out some time. " [How you can improve your play with positivity](http://duoqueue.net.au/how-you-can-improve-your-play-with-positivity/) "

I'mma stop by this thread a bit in case people have questions or cookies.

~J
